description: This script manages wireless interfaces, hostapd configurations, network bridging, DHCP settings, and web server configurations for a router device, including restart procedures for hostapd and network interface setup.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service on wlan0, including bringing interfaces down and up, and killing existing hostapd processes.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd_5G
methods.description: Reloads kernel modules rtl8812au and 88x2bu, then starts hostapd for the 5G interface.

methods.name: Hostapd_Restart
methods.description: Kills hostapd processes and restarts wlan0 interface with hostapd.
